Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cells (R-SOCs) are considered to be a promising energy conversion device that can achieve efficient conversion between fuel and electrical energy.
Titulo: Medium-entropy perovskite Pr0.4Ba0.2Ca0.2La0.2Co0.2Fe0.8O3 as a promising bifunctional electrocatalyst for electrochemical energy conversion device

Sentencas: However, there are still significant challenges in developing a promising bifunctional electrocatalyst as an electrode material for R-SOC devices.
Titulo: Medium-entropy perovskite Pr0.4Ba0.2Ca0.2La0.2Co0.2Fe0.8O3 as a promising bifunctional electrocatalyst for electrochemical energy conversion device

Sentencas: Here, a mediumentropy perovskite Pr0.4Ba0.2Ca0.2La0.2Co0.2Fe0.8O3 (PBCLCF) is designed to enhance the electrochemical oxidation and reduction activity.
Titulo: Medium-entropy perovskite Pr0.4Ba0.2Ca0.2La0.2Co0.2Fe0.8O3 as a promising bifunctional electrocatalyst for electrochemical energy conversion device

Sentencas: Under hydrogen atmosphere, cobalt metals are in situ exsolved from the perovskite structure, accompanied by partial phase transformation (denoted as R-PBCLCF).
Titulo: Medium-entropy perovskite Pr0.4Ba0.2Ca0.2La0.2Co0.2Fe0.8O3 as a promising bifunctional electrocatalyst for electrochemical energy conversion device

Sentencas: Characterizations show that PBCLCF and R-PBCLCF can increase the concentration of oxygen vacancies, thereby enhancing oxygen migration ability.
Titulo: Medium-entropy perovskite Pr0.4Ba0.2Ca0.2La0.2Co0.2Fe0.8O3 as a promising bifunctional electrocatalyst for electrochemical energy conversion device

Sentencas: Combined with electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) and distribution of relaxation times (DRT) analysis, the medium-entropy PBCLCF exhibits better oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) activity and R-PBCLCF shows better hydrogen oxidation reaction (HOR) activity.
Titulo: Medium-entropy perovskite Pr0.4Ba0.2Ca0.2La0.2Co0.2Fe0.8O3 as a promising bifunctional electrocatalyst for electrochemical energy conversion device

Sentencas: Furthermore, the oxygen dissociation is identified as the rate-determining step (RDS) in the ORR process, whereas the HOR process is dominated by the hydrogen adsorption and dissociation.
Titulo: Medium-entropy perovskite Pr0.4Ba0.2Ca0.2La0.2Co0.2Fe0.8O3 as a promising bifunctional electrocatalyst for electrochemical energy conversion device

Sentencas: The single cell with (R-)PBCLCF showcases remarkable reversible performance.
Titulo: Medium-entropy perovskite Pr0.4Ba0.2Ca0.2La0.2Co0.2Fe0.8O3 as a promising bifunctional electrocatalyst for electrochemical energy conversion device

Sentencas: When O2 is employed as the oxidant and H2 as the fuel, this cell achieves a maximum power density of 468.1 mW cm-2 in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) mode at 700 degrees C. Moreover, when O2 is employed as the oxidant and humidified H2 (30 %H2O) as the fuel, the current density of the cell in solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) mode is -647.3 mA cm-2 at 1.3 V and 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Medium-entropy perovskite Pr0.4Ba0.2Ca0.2La0.2Co0.2Fe0.8O3 as a promising bifunctional electrocatalyst for electrochemical energy conversion device
